author: axic3354
content: I responded to this on magicians: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-3855-push0-instruction/7014/15

author: 3xmd1559sporebraytondingo
content: Would subgas particles be very unlikely to be feasible, such as for a (limited application to only a) later repricing of stack manipulation opcodes? (arithmetic seems like the next plausible target).

author: axic3354
content:
Within <@&861652182781001758> we benchmarked evmone (and partially geth) for many of these instructions, in order to determine some safe bounds. The indication was that sub 1 gas would be possible for some of them, but the we are not yet convinced the added complexity is worth it.

We would also need to (and plan to) redo these on geth in the coming months.
